trans-unit.source: How can I discover unsanctioned cloud apps that are used within my organization
trans-unit.target: How can I discover unsanctioned cloud apps that are used within my organization

trans-unit.source: This topic describes what is the Cloud App Discvery is and why you would use it.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes what is the Cloud App Discvery is and why you would use it.

trans-unit.source: In modern enterprises, IT departments are often not aware of all the cloud applications that are used by the users to do their work.
trans-unit.target: In modern enterprises, IT departments are often not aware of all the cloud applications that are used by the users to do their work.

trans-unit.source: As a consequence of this, administrators often have concerns in conjunction with unauthorized access to corporate data, possible data leakage and other security risks inherent in the applications.
trans-unit.target: As a consequence of this, administrators often have concerns in conjunction with unauthorized access to corporate data, possible data leakage and other security risks inherent in the applications.

trans-unit.source: Because they don’t know how many or which apps are used, even getting started building a plan to deal with these risks seems to be daunting.
trans-unit.target: Because they don’t know how many or which apps are used, even getting started building a plan to deal with these risks seems to be daunting.

trans-unit.source: You can address these concerns by using Cloud App Discovery.
trans-unit.target: You can address these concerns by using Cloud App Discovery.

trans-unit.source: Cloud App Discovery is a Premium feature of Azure Active Directory that enables you to discover cloud applications that are uses by the employees in your organization.
trans-unit.target: Cloud App Discovery is a Premium feature of Azure Active Directory that enables you to discover cloud applications that are uses by the employees in your organization.

trans-unit.source: With Cloud App Discovery, you can:
trans-unit.target: With Cloud App Discovery, you can:

trans-unit.source: Discover applications in use and measure usage by number of users, volume of traffic or number of web requests to the application.
trans-unit.target: Discover applications in use and measure usage by number of users, volume of traffic or number of web requests to the application.

trans-unit.source: Identify the users that are using an application.
trans-unit.target: Identify the users that are using an application.

trans-unit.source: Export data for addition offline analysis.
trans-unit.target: Export data for addition offline analysis.

trans-unit.source: Prioritize applications to bring under IT control and integrate applications easily to enable Single Sign-on and user management.
trans-unit.target: Prioritize applications to bring under IT control and integrate applications easily to enable Single Sign-on and user management.

trans-unit.source: With cloud app discovery, the data retrieval part is accomplished by agents that run on computers in your environments.
trans-unit.target: With cloud app discovery, the data retrieval part is accomplished by agents that run on computers in your environments.

trans-unit.source: The app usage information that is captured by the agents is send over a secure, encrypted channel to the cloud app discovery service.
trans-unit.target: The app usage information that is captured by the agents is send over a secure, encrypted channel to the cloud app discovery service.

trans-unit.source: The cloud app discovery service evaluates the data and generates reports you can use to analyze your environment.
trans-unit.target: The cloud app discovery service evaluates the data and generates reports you can use to analyze your environment.

trans-unit.source: <center><linkText>How Cloud App Discovery Works</linkText></center>
trans-unit.target: <center><linkText>How Cloud App Discovery Works</linkText></center>

trans-unit.source: To learn more about How Cloud app discovery works, see <linkText>Getting Started With Cloud App Discovery</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: To learn more about How Cloud app discovery works, see <linkText>Getting Started With Cloud App Discovery</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: For security and privacy considerations, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery Security and Privacy Considerations</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: For security and privacy considerations, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery Security and Privacy Considerations</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: For information about deploying the Cloud App Discovery agent in an enterprise environment with:
trans-unit.target: For information about deploying the Cloud App Discovery agent in an enterprise environment with:

trans-unit.source: Active Directory Group Policy Management, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery Group Policy Deployment Guide</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: Active Directory Group Policy Management, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery Group Policy Deployment Guide</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery System Center Deployment Guide</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: Microsoft System Center Configuration Manager, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery System Center Deployment Guide</linkText><title></title>

trans-unit.source: Proxy servers with custom ports, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery Registry Settings for Proxy Servers with Custom Ports</linkText><title></title>
trans-unit.target: Proxy servers with custom ports, see <linkText>Cloud App Discovery Registry Settings for Proxy Servers with Custom Ports</linkText><title></title>
